Class NodeAppearAnimation

Namespace
FlowGraph.Avalonia.Animation

FlowGraph.Avalonia.dll

Combines fade and scale for a complete appear/disappear effect.

public class NodeAppearAnimation : IAnimation

Constructors

NodeAppearAnimation(Node, bool, double, Action<Node, double, double>?, Action?)

Creates a new node appear/disappear animation.

public NodeAppearAnimation(Node node, bool appearing, double duration = 0.3, Action<Node, double, double>? onUpdate = null, Action? onComplete = null)

Parameters

node Node

The node to animate.

appearing bool

True for appear animation, false for disappear.

duration double

Animation duration in seconds.

onUpdate Action<Node, double, double>

Callback with (node, opacity, scale).

onComplete Action

Callback when animation completes.
